title: Self-directed Learning Program for Small Vessel Operations in Fisheries High Schools

context.prior_knowledge: Basic maritime terminology and foundational knowledge of the fisheries industry
context.additional_context: A program utilizing personalized video lectures considering individual learning pace differences and an integrated Microsoft Teams/LMS system

learning_goals: Learners can explain small vessel navigation procedures with 80% or higher accuracy.
Learners can apply core content from 70% or more of the standard ship maintenance manual.
Learners achieve 90 points or higher (out of 100) in safety navigation simulation assessments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
